item.title: Anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

K,calm down and let’s learn something new ok? [quote=“ciaman, post:3, topic:131977”]Wat that made no sense…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 08:34:05 PM[/size][hr]Still need help plz[/quote]

maybe if people had an I.Q over 35 they could read what it says. Am I right?

[Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] else if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 30; }

that means in client.java search for WanneShop = 2 And place it under the last }

Hmm let’s take a break…we got this, almost done…

now [Add in shops.cfg] 30 Barrows 1 1 1377 1000 I wonder what it means by adding in the shops.cfg, I would think maybe…somewhere in your source folder there is a shops.cfg, and maybe, just maybe I…Copy and paste it in there!

K 30 seconds left…

lyk3 omgz there iz n0 autospawn.cfg!

K, Do you have other NPC’s around? Possibly some other shops? Then you have a autospawn.cfg.

[Add in autospawn.cfg] 520 2754 2754 0 0 0 0 0 1 Barrows

Think about it…

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ok. in your autospawn.cfg, add the code ABOVE the thing that looks like [ENDOFAUTOSPAWN]
Your autospawn is in your source folder.
in client your code will look like this,

 else if (NPCID == SOMETHING) {
   PutNPCCords = true;
   WanneShop = SOMETHING;
}
 else if (NPCID == 520) {
   PutNPCCords = true;
   WanneShop = 30;
}

item.title: Anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @ciaman ciaman
item.description:
@ciaman wrote:

I have downloaded shopmaker and i generated code but where do I put the numbers it says this

[Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 Barrows 1 1 1377 1000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 2754 2754 0 0 0 0 0 1 Barrows

Where do i put the numbers under add in autospawn.cfg I cant find autospawn If you can tell me where autosapwn is tell me where to add same with shops.cfg and the client.java

[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 07:08:18 PM[/size][hr]Bump
